WorkItem.Description:
Does not work with https/ssl web services if certificate isn't OK.
 
Fails with: "Could not establish trust relationship for the SSL/TLS secure channel"
 
I usually solve this with C# code:
 
  System.Net.ServicePointManager.ServerCertificateValidationCallback = delegate { return true; };

Comments.Message: I have the same problem. It's relatively easy to fix on your side, but until this line is incorporated I cannot test SSL services using self-signed certificates (usually the case in development mode)
